end_height.description: When end height greater than zero and block height exceeds this value, the swap is expired. Once a swap is expired, it can be returned to the original source (via "refund").

end_time.description: When end time (in seconds since epoch 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) is greater than zero and block time exceeds this value, the swap is expired. Once a swap is expired, it can be returned to the original source (via "refund").

hash.description: This is hex-encoded sha-256 hash of the preimage (must be 32*2 = 64 chars)

recipient.description: If released, funds go to the recipient

source.description: If refunded, funds go to the source
